name: Atlantis Operation
description:
Hi we are a young team of students and we present you :
Atlantis Operation. It's a shoot'em'up where you control a submarine in quest of the mysterious city of Atlantis. Use your modular weapons to defeat many enemies, watch out ! 

This is the first lvl and the game is in development, dont hesitate to give us your feedbacks. Right now we can tell you that we gonna debugs a lot of things, put all the animations and the 2 phases of the first boss will be clear.
